mapper.update: update erp_sub_purchase set psb_pro_no=#{psb_pro_no}, psb_qty=#{psb_qty}, psb_pro_price=#{psb_pro_price}, psb_price=#{psb_price}, psb_tax=#{psb_tax},psb_sum=#{psb_sum} where psb_no = #{psb_no}
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum as purchaseno,ps_no,ps_date,ps_cus,ps_m_id,ps_con,ps_cur,ps_type,ps_note from (select * from erp_purchase order by ps_no))where purchaseno <=#{start} and purchaseno >= #{end} order by purchaseno desc

select psb_no,psb_pro_no,mino as psb_no,pCount as sb_pro_count ,pSum as psb_sum from erp_sub_purchase , (select psb_s_no,min(psb_no) as mino,count(psb_pro_no)-1 as pCount,sum(psb_sum) as pSum from erp_sub_purchase where psb_s_no = #{ps_no} group by psb_s_no ) where mino = psb_no

select * from erp_purchase inner join erp_customer on erp_purchase.ps_cus = erp_customer.cus_name inner join erp_member on erp_purchase.ps_m_id = erp_member.m_id inner join erp_company on erp_member.m_code = erp_company.com_key where ps_no = #{ps_no}
select * from erp_sub_purchase inner join erp_product on erp_sub_purchase.psb_pro_no = erp_product.pro_no where psb_s_no = #{ps_no}
select * from erp_sub_purchase inner join erp_product on erp_sub_purchase.psb_pro_no = erp_product.pro_no where psb_s_no =#{psb_s_no}
